name: Aerospace Engineering
description: Designs, develops, and manufactures aircraft, spacecraft, and missiles, as well as components and systems for the aerospace industry.

name: Automotive Engineering
description: Develops and manufactures vehicles, including cars, trucks, buses, and motorcycles, as well as components and systems for the automotive industry.

name: Biomedical Engineering
description: Applies engineering principles to medical and biological systems, developing innovative solutions for healthcare, medical devices, and biotechnology.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Designs, builds, and maintains infrastructure, including roads, bridges, buildings, and public works, ensuring safe and sustainable development.

name: Computer Hardware Engineering
description: Designs, develops, and manufactures computer hardware components, including processors, memory devices, and peripherals.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Develops and applies electrical systems, including electrical circuits, electronics, and electromagnetism, for a wide range of industries.

name: Environmental Engineering
description: Applies engineering principles to mitigate the impact of human activity on the environment, developing sustainable solutions for air, water, and land pollution.

name: Industrial Engineering
description: Optimizes the performance of complex systems, including manufacturing, logistics, and supply chain management, to improve efficiency and productivity.

name: Materials Science and Engineering
description: Develops and applies materials with unique properties, including metals, ceramics, polymers, and composites, for a wide range of industrial applications.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Designs, develops, and manufactures mechanical systems, including engines, machines, and devices, for a wide range of industries.

name: Nuclear Engineering
description: Develops and applies nuclear energy systems, including reactors, fuel cycles, and radiation protection, for power generation and other applications.

name: Oil and Gas Engineering
description: Develops and applies technologies for the exploration, production, and transportation of oil and natural gas, including drilling, extraction, and refining.

name: Robotics Engineering
description: Designs, develops, and manufactures robots and robotic systems, including autonomous systems, for a wide range of industrial and service applications.

name: Software Engineering
description: Develops and applies software solutions, including design, development, testing, and maintenance, for a wide range of industries and applications.

name: Structural Engineering
description: Designs, analyzes, and develops structures, including buildings, bridges, and towers, to ensure safety, efficiency, and sustainability.

name: Systems Engineering
description: Integrates multiple disciplines to design, develop, and manage complex systems, including aerospace, defense, and industrial applications.

name: Telecommunications Engineering
description: Develops and applies telecommunications systems, including networks, protocols, and devices, for voice, data, and video communication.
